fields.description:
HIVE-17933 moved the generated sources to gen/version directory
HIVE-17907 committed the src/gen/org/apache/hadoop/hive/metastore/annotation/package-info.java file

Because of this IDEA can not compile the standalone-metastore module.
It fails with this stack trace:
{code}
Information:java: An exception has occurred in the compiler (1.8.0_152). Please file a bug against the Java compiler via the Java bug reporting page (http://bugreport.java.com) after checking the Bug Database (http://bugs.java.com) for duplicates. Include your program and the following diagnostic in your report. Thank you.

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.summary: standalone-metastore gen dir contains two annotation/package-info.java which causes IDEA build fail
